overview:
Colum Lundt is one of the Co-Founders and the COO of Bridge Energy Group.

Mr. Lundt is responsible for the strategic and operational leadership of the companyâ€™s sales, delivery and back-office organization. Mr. Lundt brings over 15 years experience in sales, recruiting and management to the role. Prior to founding Bridge, he led US sales for Connect Global Solutions (now Welocalize), a European-based Software Localization company. Before that, Mr. Lundt sold for the prestigious Winning Inc., a Sandler Sales company providing global sales training to clients such as Oracle and Xerox Global Services. Previously, he spent six years growing Darwin Partners (now Dextrys), an IT Solutions firm, from $14M to $150M in revenue. During his tenure at Darwin, Mr. Lundt co-founded the Enterprise Reporting practice, ran an $18 million delivery services group, and managed the Telecomm and Utility vertical.

Mr. Lundtâ€™s career began in customer service and sales for Fleet Bank, now Bank of America, after attending Assumption College and serving in the US Marine Corps.
